name: Alone in the... SHROOMS?
description:
Here is our first 48h project made during a GameJam on construct 3 !

You're in an submarine base, where strange experimentations on vegetables occured... And they're not quite nice !

Fight your way in the rooms to find the source of all the environning chaos, and survive. Good luck !

Base commands :

moves : arrows     ;     interact : space      ;      shoot : left click     ;     cut : right click

Discover the rest in-game !
